result.name: physical-and-chemical-properties-of-seawater-for-the-north-sea-in-each-month-of-1976
result.notes:
Series of 12 cruises carried out by Cefas in 1976 on board RV Corella and RV 
Clione, resampling a grid of fixed stations every month throughout 1976. Data 
provided: date; station number; time; position (latitude and longitude); 
depth; tide direction; wind speed and direction. Environmental variables 
measured include: temperature (surface and bottom), saliny, transparency (%), 
nutrient concentrations (nitrite, nitrate, phosphate, silicate); chlorophyll-a 
(total and nano); phaeophytin (total and nano). These data have been converted 
into digital format (excel files); however there is more data collected during 
the same survey (e.g. fish stomach content; fish larvae counts; phytoplankton 
counts) that has not been converted and is still in paper format (paper 
records are kept by Steve Milligan, Plankton Lab).

organization.name: marine-environmental-data-information-network
organization.title: Marine Environmental Data & Information Network
organization.description: MEDIN is a partnership of UK organisations committed to improving access to marine data. Our partners are both public and private sector.

result.title: Physical and chemical properties of seawater for the North Sea, in each month of 1976

resources.description: The Cefas Data Portal contains metadata records and data sets available to download and connect to in support of our commitment to open science. Data is available in the following formats: CSV, ESRI Shapefile. The data can also be accessed via the WFS and WMS protocols.
resources.name: Cefas Data Portal
